message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $7200? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get an amazing deal on this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $6800. How about we meet at $6900?

I understand you're still looking for a bit more wiggle room, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $7100? It's getting close to my minimum, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $6800. How about we meet at $6850?
